title: If you're Soraka, what dumbass excuse do you have for not healing?!
body:
"If you expect to win, don't count on heals to do so"

It's like saying "if you wanna win, u better start 4v5ing". Cus fk playin the champ, fk playin the team comp, fk playin as a team period.

Why would anyone just plain, straight down refuse to fkn use an ability of their kit? Especially the thing they're most known for. You're Soraka, you heal. I don't even fkn know or care what ur other shit does. Sure, you have a silence and some shit that steals movement, maybe? Like Janna? I don't fkn know! And ur ult heals too, including ur self preserving ass, and that's prolly the only reason you dared to 'waste' ur mana on it, otherwise fk the dying team while ur sittin in fountain, chillin. Right?
You.
Heal.
And you don't build full ap while watchin your team mates scramble around u with 1% hp pinging for assistance, then drop like flies.
That's straight trolling and inting, cus you're clearly not on our team, but assisting the enemy.

And lemme guess, even if 4 people reported, after being so obvious that even the enemy clearly stated honor all except raka, not to mention you only need ONE lousy report, I won't get a feedback. Cus why would the system work.

replies.body: Lol, I love playing raka. I have like a 75% win rate with her. I love healing. Why would you play raka and not heal? Da ffffuuuuq.
I've noticed this is generally the case when Soraka gets focused hard with no peel. Healing, in this case, will inevitably end up getting Soraka killed faster.
which is why i build AP, armor, and magic resist. i avoid max hp items like the plague and instead get hp regen items - though there arent many :/
This. Especiallu becuase Raka hits herself with true damage with every heal.

Raka main here. Generally speaking.  When people complain about me not healing. Its either
A. On cooldown
B. Because im low health 
C. Im letting them die because they decided to chase into the enemy jungle with no wards and die 1v3

Agreed. 

The one thing I've noticed as a support main is that the majority of people that whine about their supports typically don't have the common sense to realize that we have things called cooldowns. Or mana. Or health.
I recommend you go play and learn soraka. About 40 ranked games should do. Then come back and see if your attitude isn't a little nicer.
3 games is enough :P

Soraka can't heal when she is below a certain health.

Her heals pretty much cost mana and health. :)

While being to lazy to bother to upgrade into mastery 7 Soraka. I could list a few reasons for not healing.

http://i.imgur.com/OCepgSQ.png

1.) I'm being focused on and no one bothering to help out and peel them away.
2.) I lack the CDR to constantly heal everyone or keeping up with the damage you are receiving.
3.) I lack the life/mana to cast more spells.
4.) You keep charging in and keeping yourself out of my healing range. Which may cause me to go out into the danger over being safe in the back line.
5.) I died. Probably because they got smart and focused the healer.
https://imgur.com/a/N5nv5

1. I won't heal you if you are jerk to me and flame for no reason 
2. I won't heal you if I have less health then you
3. I won't heal you if you have good amount of health but you want to be full

Just a tip:
Never flame your support, especially Soraka... and others who provide you with essential things to stay alive

Ps. You sound like a jerk, that's probably why you didnt get the heal :)

Then you are guilty of negative behavior because you aren't playing to win you are TROLLING when you do this the joy of this stupid game is that as long as you are nice you can do this shit every game and get away with it.

You are not entilted to anything. If you flame me, your support, of course I'm NOT GONNA TAKE MY OWN HEALTH AND GIVE IT TO YOU, you dumbass. 
There are other people on the team who deserve it/need it, and don't flame. Even if that means keeping it on my health bar and not healing anyone.

You can flame, but when you need your support you start crying like a baby. Put on your big boy pants and do the work alone.
If you can flame, then you can survive without my heal, right? :)

And by "you" I mean you and other shits like you.

This reiterates the fact that you are equally toxic by purposely screwing over your teammates. I am sorry you can't handle being called out on your shit. It's never acceptable to respond to toxicity by being toxic... quoted from DEEP TERROR NAMI board moderator.

Toxic? Nah, I just ignore a toxic person. :)

Think about your consequences  before you start flaming your support. :)
Admitting you screw over your ADC ruins the game. There is no logic in it because you still take the L

Prove it in the game :*

Doesnt mean we'll lose. Ill just support other people, people who act the way I said are shit in the game 90% of the time :)

Yeah when you ignore one player and don't give them support you turn the game into a 4v5...
You might just be too stupid to grasp that concept though
Cry me a river :)))))
You're that special kind of person that spam pings when our abilities are on cooldown and you dove their turret to 1v2 aren't you?
Psychopath?  Uhh, ok.
You make assumptions about how I play with no evidence to support your claim. Bet you're a Millennial. XD

I would do that in a MMORPG, as I can just find another party just near an instant. But in league, just heal them. Play your role and help out the team. You're going to be stuck with them till the game ends.
This person gets it. Thx M8

you shouldnt rely on soraka to heal you in order to win your battle. if everyone on the team did that soraka wouldnt be able to heal them. soraka is just there if something goes wrong so that you can either run away or survive long enough to turn the tables. not so you can dive 1v5 and blame her for not healing fast enough.

she's literally guaranteed to take damage because her W siphons her life away every time she uses it. there's no outplaying that.
Um, keeping yourself alive?

Only excuse I have for not healing is in ARAM where your healing early does nearly nothing but hurt you in the early game. And I play an aggressive Soraka, so I don't put points in W until like 2 items and 35% CD in.

As a Soraka "main" since pre-RW days, I suggest you actually play the champ yourself and see how much pressure you're in when to and not to heal or aggro. She's not always meant to be your outright heal bot, especially in matters where you're freaking dead and healing you would only be a waste of action. Believe me I've seen the flame. I've had someone get caught by a Thresh hook, CC'd to death, and I got ping spammed because I didn't walk up to the gap closers the enemy still had to throw what of 200 more HP they could cut through in a single marksman auto.

C'mon...she's not as braindead as you're ranting her out to be.

I buy a few active-items to help turn the tides when I am focused and I'm careful about my positioning, warding and silencing underneath myself when getting focused by melee supports or junglers. I also am more proactive in assisting other lanes or my jungler when he's being counterjungled or is counterjungling and getting caught. I use the passive speed boost to escape with my low health target if my low health target isn't in range for the enemy to kill them. I also run talisman for the passive hp regen on minion deaths and the speedboost for getaways.
Maybe I've been blessed, but almost all of the Sorakas I've received have been really generous.
